DigitalIOItem.Name: DoorClosed
DigitalIOItem.Description: Indicates whether the side door of the flexFELLOW is closed (TRUE) or opened (FALSE).

DigitalIOItem.Name: RedLight
DigitalIOItem.Description: Enables the RED signal light. TRUE -> light is powered, FALSE -> light is unpowered.

DigitalIOItem.Name: YellowLight
DigitalIOItem.Description: Enables the YELLOW signal light. TRUE -> light is powered, FALSE -> light is unpowered.

DigitalIOItem.Name: GreenLight
DigitalIOItem.Description: Enables the GREEN signal light. TRUE -> light is powered, FALSE -> light is unpowered.

DigitalIOItem.Name: BlueLight
DigitalIOItem.Description: Enables the BLUE signal light. TRUE -> light is powered, FALSE -> light is unpowered.

DigitalIOItem.Name: Buzzer
DigitalIOItem.Description: Enables the buzzer (acoustic signal). TRUE -> buzzer is powered, FALSE -> buzzer is unpowered.

IOGroup.Description: This IO group contains all input and output signals which are provided by the flexFELLOW chosen in the StationSetup of the Sunrise-Project.
